text: Ezɨ Kantrin Igharazibar Gumazir Iesusɨn gɨn zuibara, e akɨnafarir mamɨn uan nɨghnɨzim osirigha me bagha fomɨra anemada. Egha me mɨgɨa ghaze, ia marvir guabar ofa gamir asɨzibar aman markɨ. Egh ia uaghan asɨzir ghuziba itiba koma asɨzir me fɨragharim gafa mɨsozibar aman markɨ, egh uari isɨ dakuva arazir kurabar amuan markɨ.”
